summary: Lydia is your TRUE companion. She\'s ready to give her life for you, following you to hell without saying a word. But she doesn\'t leave of being a girl, an adventurer and brave one, but a girl at last. Here\'s just a vanilla change to her look, to make her a little bit like the other girls (still nobody can beat her).
descriptionHtml:
[size=14]BUG FIXED!

There was some miscoloring with the face and the body... This new file should fix that. Sorry for the issue! And thanks again for the downloads.[/size]

[i]Hi all! This is my 5th mod of the vanilla changes, and first of all [u][b]I want to thank you for the support.[/b][/u]

[color=olive]For me, [b]Lydia is the best follower in the game[/b], a true companion, a true friend when the things come bad and the dragurs are chasing you. And yeah, almost all of the game time you\'re with her covering your back. So, I just thought that she deserves a change, to look a little bit more worked, more femmenine keeping that brave nordic style. And remember that she\'s able to marryage![/color][/i]

Im using the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812]Better Females by Bella[/url] mod, but [b]this is [u]just a vanilla change[/b][/u]. If you have got another texture\'s for woman (or if you just have the vanilla version), [u]its [b]NOT[/b] a problem[/u]. Probabbly you should get a less smooth skin, but the face change should be there. Anyways, I really recommend the mod.

[i]If you like it, you may try my other vanilla changes:[/i]

[b]Dravynea the Stoneweaver[/b]: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24694]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24694[/url]

[b]Avrusa Sarethi[/b]: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24500]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24500[/url]

[b]Borgakh the Steel Heart[/b]: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24418]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24418[/url]

[b]Ysolda[/b]: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24413]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24413[/url]

[b]Brelyna Maryon[/b]: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24435]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24435[/url]

Hope you enjoy it!
author: ArouetX
